attributes.action: Make it law to keep dogs on leads around livestock and on farm land
attributes.additional_details: If the government go through with this it will help minimise the destruction these incidents have not only on the livestock’s well being but the farmers as this is their livelihood.
attributes.background: Make it law to keep dogs on leads around livestock and on farm land. As it is becoming a serious problem throughout the UK, farmers have no authority to tell the public to put their dog on a lead around livestock as it is not the law.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633277
